name: Sacrifice at Hollow Castle
description:
A game built for Spooktober 2021 Jam by tinkersmith and todorrobot. Theme: Sacrifice

Arrow keys to move. Space to shoot (when needed)

Please let me know how you liked it and I will probably do a post-mortem on it after judging. Backgrounds scanned from a book of royalty-free illustrations I bought at a yard sale for $4. Everything made within the timeframe. Music by Baconcat008
